item.description:
** UPDATE **

All tickets to this event have been sold.
__________________________________________________

Special Bridgeport Bluefish Game to Benefit the Community
When: June 28th
Where: Bridgeport Bluefish stadium, Ballpark at Harbor Yard
Directions and parking: http://www.bridgeport...
Time: 5:30 p.m.

Hi my name is Amanda and I am a board member for Bethel Recovery Center. We are selling tickets to the Bridgeport Bluefish Game and proceeds will benefit our cause.

The Bethel Recovery Center provides a safe, sober, and structured environment for women throughout Connecticut desiring continual support in their recovery. Among our services, we provide support groups, counseling, and educational opportunities to residents.

Tickets are $15 and they are Field Box seats- very close to the field. Please RSVP yes or no only by June 20th at the latest.

I will meet everyone at the box office 1/2 hour prior to the event start (which is at 5:30 p.m.) to collect money and distribute tickets. Tickets will be together.

My contact info: amanda.golbabai@gmail.com
My cellphone: 860-803-9525
item.name: Special Bridgeport Bluefish Game to Benefit the Community
